About Me

I’m a full-stack software engineer helping companies implement real solutions.

I’m obsessed with all things digital, strongly believing in the intersection of design & technology.

I believe building meaningful and engaging digital experiences is not only about hiring the best agency, but also about choosing the one that will be able to make the most out of your idea and will push it further than you could have imagined.

Front-End

HTML5 | CSS3 | Sass | JavaScript | ReactJS

This website was created in pure HTML, CSS and Vanilla JavaScript. So many developers and digital companies these days rely on bloated libraries and frameworks which can stunt growth and creativity.

I believe learning and building applications from the ground up is important in optimizing efficiency as well as cultivating creativity.

Back-End

NodeJS | PHP | Python | MySQL | PostgreSQL

One of my first passions in software development was database design and development. I've always had a keen interest in how data profoundly affects our lives.

Learning to extract data with complex queries and performing data analysis using SQL has given me an invaluable toolset when working with companies' big data.

Design

Photoshop | Xd | Figma | Sketch

Proficiency in prototyping and graphical tools is imperative in helping developers and clients collaborate and build understanding.

Good design is not just getting your message out there but is important for enhancing the quality of your message.
